channel.title: Client compile
channel.description: guys sorry but i need help badly i need the code to make my compile work in my client current compile code [code] @ECHO OFF TITLE ELEMENTAL Compiler "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0.10\bin\java.exe" -cp . *.java pause [/code] this is what is in the run (my run is called "client with GUI )(what is gui) anyways: [code] @echo off COLOR 09 title elemental @echo elemental Client @echo ----------------------- java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32 pause [/code] thanks

item.title: Client compile
item.dc:creator: @sticky_wicky sticky wicky
item.description:
@sticky_wicky wrote:

guys sorry but i need help badly i need the code to make my compile work in my client
current compile code

@ECHO OFF
TITLE ELEMENTAL Compiler
"C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0.10\bin\java.exe" -cp . *.java
pause

this is what is in the run (my run is called "client with GUI )(what is gui) anyways:

@echo off
COLOR 09
title elemental
@echo elemental Client
@echo -----------------------
java -Xmx1000m -cp .;Theme.jar Gui 0 0 highmem members 32
pause

thanks

Read full topic
